languages.text: Далекие звездные системы, мало исследованные Империумом, скрывают мрачные тайны из далекой истории, утраченные колонии Человечества и противоестественные, опасные для тела и рассудка аномалии.

traits.locale_text: Далекие звездные системы, мало исследованные Империумом, скрывают мрачные тайны из далекой истории, утраченные колонии Человечества и противоестественные, опасные для тела и рассудка аномалии.

languages.text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.
languages.original_text: Далекие звездные системы, мало исследованные Империумом, скрывают мрачные тайны из далекой истории, утраченные колонии Человечества и противоестественные, опасные для тела и рассудка аномалии.

traits.locale_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.
Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.
Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.
Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.

languages.text: Les systèmes stellaires lointains, peu explorés par l'Imperium, abritent de sinistres secrets venus du fond des âges, des colonies humaines perdues ou des anomalies surnaturelles dangereuses pour le corps et l'esprit.
languages.original_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.

traits.locale_text: Les systèmes stellaires lointains, peu explorés par l'Imperium, abritent de sinistres secrets venus du fond des âges, des colonies humaines perdues ou des anomalies surnaturelles dangereuses pour le corps et l'esprit.

languages.text: Los sistemas estelares distantes, apenas explorados por el Imperium, ocultan secretos oscuros de milenios pasados, colonias perdidas de la Humanidad y anomalías antinaturales que amenazan al cuerpo y a la mente.
languages.original_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.

traits.locale_text: Los sistemas estelares distantes, apenas explorados por el Imperium, ocultan secretos oscuros de milenios pasados, colonias perdidas de la Humanidad y anomalías antinaturales que amenazan al cuerpo y a la mente.

languages.text: 帝国の探索の手がほとんど及んでいない彼方の星系には、深い歴史による厳然たる秘密、人類の失われたコロニー、心身ともに危険にさらす不自然な異常が隠されている。
languages.original_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の探索の手がほとんど及んでいない彼方の星系には、深い歴史による厳然たる秘密、人類の失われたコロニー、心身ともに危険にさらす不自然な異常が隠されている。

languages.text: 那些尚未被帝国探索过的遥远星系，往往包含着历史的残酷秘密，或是人类业已失落的殖民地，或是会威胁身体与灵魂的超自然异常现象。
languages.original_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.

traits.locale_text: 那些尚未被帝国探索过的遥远星系，往往包含着历史的残酷秘密，或是人类业已失落的殖民地，或是会威胁身体与灵魂的超自然异常现象。

languages.text: Ferne, vom Imperium kaum erkundete, Sternsysteme bergen dunkle Geheimnisse längst vergangener Zeiten, vergessene Kolonien der Menschheit und unnatürliche Anomalien, die Körper und Geist gleichermaßen gefährden.
languages.original_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.

traits.locale_text: Ferne, vom Imperium kaum erkundete, Sternsysteme bergen dunkle Geheimnisse längst vergangener Zeiten, vergessene Kolonien der Menschheit und unnatürliche Anomalien, die Körper und Geist gleichermaßen gefährden.

languages.text: İmparatorluk tarafından çok az bölgesi keşfedilen bu uzak yıldız sistemleri; tarihin derinliklerinden korkunç sırları, İnsanlığın kayıp kolonilerini ve hem bedeni hem de zihni tehlikeye sokan gayritabii anomaliler barındırır.
languages.original_text: Distant star systems, little explored by the Imperium, conceal within themselves grim secrets from deep history, lost colonies of Humanity, and unnatural anomalies that imperil both body and mind.
